I Dabble

I write occasionally (less frequently these days than I would care to admit) at anotherbloggerbloke.blogspot.in. This started off many years ago as an arbit collection of personal posts and at the most chuckle-inducing rants but seems to have grown older and wiser over the years into a longer form comprising quite a few travelogues. Travelling has been a deeply personal and favourite pastime.

The other side to storytelling comes in the form of photography, another evolving and satisfying hobby. You can find my work at Whistle for level crossing.

built with jekyll and scribble
